19 TEST(ImageSize,ShouldPass){
20 
25 
28 
29  double mapSize=20.0;
30  double resolution=0.1;
31 
32  int pixels = (int) mapSize / resolution;
33 
34  // Create an OgMap which is a grayscale (mono) image of size pixels
35  cv::Mat image = cv::Mat::zeros(pixels,pixels, CV_8UC1);
36 
37  // Let's check map size compared to allocation, just in case
38  ASSERT_EQ(pixels, image.rows);
39  ASSERT_EQ(pixels, image.cols);
40 
41  // Let's check the map is allocated all zeros
42  ASSERT_EQ(0,image.at<uchar>(0,0));
43 
44  // Draw a link from top left to botom right corner
45  cv::line(image,cv::Point(0,0),cv::Point(pixels,pixels),cv::Scalar(255,255,255),1);
46 
47  // Let's check the centre is now white (255)
48  ASSERT_EQ(255,image.at<uchar>(pixels/2,pixels/2));
49 }
